rules.natural: Either the protected area is threatened by deforestation, or it contains old growth forest, or it contains wetlands.
Provided that the conservation agency conducts a biodiversity survey, it is not the case that the protected area is threatened by deforestation.
If the survey team uses GPS technology, then they record species data.
Under the condition that the survey team records species data, the conservation agency conducts a biodiversity survey.
The biodiversity survey requiring a field permit implies that the nature reserve is located in the protected area.
The field permit being issued by a government agency implies that the biodiversity survey requires a field permit.
Either the industrial company violates conservation laws, or if the conservation agency does not receive government grant funding, then the field permit is issued by a government agency.
Under the condition that a legal complaint results in a court hearing, the industrial company does not violate conservation laws.
Either the industrial company proposes a mining project, or if the conservation agency files a legal complaint, then it results in a court hearing.
Whenever the conservation agency submits an environmental impact statement, it includes mitigation measures.
Provided that the environmental impact statement includes mitigation measures, it is not the case that the industrial company proposes a mining project.

rules.prover9_expression: (manages(conservation_agency, research_facility) | (operates_in(conservation_agency, amazon_region) -> (has_skill(ecologist, data_analysis) -> (requires(research_paper, field_work) -> publishes(conservation_agency, research_paper)))))
rules.natural: Either the conservation agency manages a research facility, or if it operates in the Amazon region, then under the condition that the ecologist has data analysis skills, if the research paper requires field work, the conservation agency publishes it.
Laboratory equipment being available at the research facility implies that the conservation agency does not manage the research facility.
If the protected area contains old growth forest, then the conservation agency receives government grant funding.
Provided that the protected area contains wetlands, the conservation agency receives government grant funding.
Under the condition that it is not the case that not receiving government grant funding implies the nature reserve is located in the protected area, the research paper requires field work.

Provided that it is not the case that not receiving government grant funding implies the nature reserve is located in the protected area, it is not the case that the conservation agency publishes a research paper.
